record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1920. Fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: T. Eck, J. Mason, C. C. Jackson, C. M. Redmon, G. F. Moulton, and N. B. Johnson; third row: C. G. Higgins, A. W. Brickman, C. C. McWilliams, and A. J. Bartky; second row: E. H. Moore, J. B. Hall, S. H. Speer (captain), M. B. Harris, and M. C. Phillips; first row: B. B. Hall, H. W. Kennedy, G. L. Otis, A. R. Jones, W. Bowers, and [?] McArthur.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
